Message:
Before I knew it,
the time had come for me
to make it on my own.
The time for me to go out
on my healer’s journey.

But, all that stood in the back
of my mind was doubt.

I couldn’t even lift my head,
let alone set out on a journey.

Seeing me like that,
my master said in a kind,
yet stern voice...

“From this day forth,
you will learn many things
in this vast world of ours
and save countless lives.

So lift your head up at once,
Yuni the healer.”

That’s right...
There are people in
this world waiting
for my help.

I’d become a healer to
save those very people.

As those words left my lips,
I broke into a sprint without
turning back even once.

From this day forward,
meetings and endings
will continue with each
new person I meet.

I’ll have to bear the pain
of every goodbye.

I’m sure the only
comfort I’ll find is
in my own memories.
That’s why...
I won’t look back anymore.
